TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 URL 段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a URL segment to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在网站中实现 ASP.NET 路由，则可以使用 对象将请求的 URL 段的值绑定到数据库查询或命令。If you implement ASP.NET routing in a Web site, you can use the object to bind the value of a segment of the requested URL to a database query or command. 可以 在数据源控件或控件的标记中声明对象 。You can declare objects in markup for data source controls or the control. 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目： [下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168640)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=168640). ## Examples 本节中的示例演示如何使用 标记中的对象将 URL 参数值传递给为数据源控件指定的查询。The examples in this section show how to use objects in markup to pass URL parameter values to a query that is specified for a data source control. 下面的示例显示了 global.asax 页中的代码，该代码定义了一个名为的路由 `ProductRoute` 。The following example shows code in the Global.asax page that defines a route that is named `ProductRoute`. 路由定义名为的 URL 参数 `productname` 。The route defines a URL parameter that is named `productname`. 该路由还定义了一个名为的可选 "容器" 参数，该参数 `culture` 可用于指定显示产品说明所用的语言。The route also defines an optional catchall parameter that is named `culture`, which can be used to specify the language in which the product description is displayed. Product .aspx 页处理此路由的请求。The Product.aspx page handles requests for this route. 下面的示例演示了 "default.aspx" 页。The following example shows the Product.aspx page. 此页面包含一个 控件，该查询需要两个参数，一个用于产品名称，另一个用于产品说明的语言。The page contains a control that has a query that requires two parameters, one for the name of the product and one for the language of the product description. 对象用于为查询参数提供值。 objects are used to supply the values for the query parameters. 路由 URL 参数的值 `productname` 将传递给查询参数 `@productname` 。The value of the route URL parameter `productname` is passed to the query parameter `@productname`. 路由 URL 参数的值 `culture` 将传递给查询参数 `@culture` 。The value of the route URL parameter `culture` is passed to the query parameter `@culture`. 如果路由 URL 不包含 URL 参数 `culture` ，则使用默认值 "en"。If a route URL does not include the URL parameter `culture`, a default value of "en" is used. 下面的示例演示一个名为 ProductLinks 的页面，其中包含通过使用路由 Url 链接到该 .aspx 页面的超链接。The following example shows a page that is named ProductLinks.aspx, which contains hyperlinks that link to the Product.aspx page by using route URLs. 这些超链接使用 `RouteUrl` 表达式来创建路由 url。These hyperlinks use `RouteUrl` expressions to create route URLs. 第一个链接不包含 `culture` 路由参数。The first link does not include a `culture` route parameter. 因此， `@culture` 将在查询中使用在 query 参数的对象中定义的默认值 "en"。Therefore, the default value of "en" that is defined in the object for `@culture` query parameter will be used in the query. 第二个链接提供 `culture` 值 "fr"，这会使说明以法语显示。The second link provides a `culture` value of "fr", which causes the description to be displayed in French. 有关如何使用表达式的详细信息 `RouteUrl` ，请参阅 [如何：从路由构造 url](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668176(v=vs.100))。For more information about how to use `RouteUrl` expressions, see [How to: Construct URLs from Routes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668176(v=vs.100)). 单击第一个超链接时，将看到 "Product .aspx" 页，其中包含控件中的以下值 ：When you click the first hyperlink, you see the Product.aspx page with the following values in the control: |ProductIDProductID|名称Name|说明Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`994`|`LL Bottom Bracket`|`Chromoly steel.`| 单击第二个超链接时，控件中将显示以下值 ：When you click the second hyperlink, you see the following values in the control: |ProductIDProductID|名称Name|说明Description| |---------------|----------|-----------------| |`994`|`LL Bottom Bracket`|`Acier chromé.`| 若要运行此示例，请将这两个 .aspx 页和 global.asax 文件中的代码添加到 ASP.NET 网站或 Web 应用程序，该网站或 Web 应用程序定义了一个名 `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString` 为的 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的连接字符串。To run this example, add the two .aspx pages and the code in the Global.asax file to an ASP.NET Web site or Web application that defines a connection string named `AdventureWorksLTConnectionString` for the AdventureWorksLT database. 有关如何建立与 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的连接的信息，请参阅 [如何：为 ASP.NET 开发设置 AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356)。For information about how to set up a connection to the AdventureWorksLT database, see [How to: Set Up an AdventureWorksLT Sample Database for ASP.NET Development](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2baad633-9d63-49cc-a6b2-917cafd35356). 有关 ASP.NET 路由的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 路由](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100))。For more information about ASP.NET routing, see [ASP.NET Routing](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/cc668201(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置从中检索路由参数值的路由段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the route segment from which to retrieve the value for the route parameter.

value.span: 包含参数值的路由段的名称。

span.span: The name of the route segment that contains the value for the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义路由模式时，可以包括用作 Web 请求 URL 中实际值占位符的段。When you define a route pattern, you can include segments that serve as placeholders for the actual values in the Web request URL. 可以通过将占位符括在大括号中来定义占位符 ( `{` 和 `}` ) 。You define placeholders by enclosing them in braces ( `{` and `}` ). 例如，格式为的路由模式 `blog/{action}/{entry}` 包含名为 `action` 和的占位符 `entry` 。For example, a route pattern in the format `blog/{action}/{entry}` contains placeholders named `action` and `entry`. 若要检索占位符的值，请将 属性设置为占位符的名称并调用 方法。To retrieve the value of a placeholder, set the property to the name of the placeholder and call the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Routing
